rComments: This is what happens when one's mind is poisoned by philosophy.  The below comment is not an exageration. Sampath talks as if he 'is' (for lack of a better word) Heidegger. Almost everybody got a B, and yet learned very little from this course. Unless you understand the cryptic terms of continetal philosophy, i discourage this prof.

I would not recommend his class. His lectures are what he calls "stream of consciousness"(aka, BS! He doesn't prepare anything). Also, he grades rather unfairly. His exams are essay Q's, and almost everyone gets Bs. Also, this he's kind of schizo; he thinks he is the reincarnation of Heidegger. I would think strongly before taking his class...
